name: CAO - Flathead V21 - Big Block
additionalNotes: CAO’s top-selling and extremely popular Flathead has added another limited-edition release for 2021 called CAO Flathead V21. The CAO Flathead V21 limited edition box-pressed cigar is a flavorful, medium strength line extension to the ever popular Flathead brand. Its oily, dark Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper is placed over a USA Connecticut Broadleaf binder and filler tobacco from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua. The CAO Flathead V21 delivers the distinctive notes of molasses and leather, this time with even more depth and complexity.
